Differential Equation | Piecewise forcing function example

piecewise forcing functions and the\nLopoloce tronsform\n[imath]\mathbf{y}^{\prime \prime}+2 \mathbf{y}^{\prime}+2 \mathbf{y}=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}\ne^{t} & 0 \leq t \leq 1 \\\ne^{t}-1 & t>0\n\end{array}\right.[/imath][imath]e^{t} & 0 \leq t \leq 1 [/imath] [imath]e^{t}-1 & t>0[/imath]
